WorkItem.Description:
When loading my Warlock from the armory or from the resultant XML file, Rawr throws an error message.
 
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Load Rawr3: http://elitistjerks.com/rawr.php
2. File, Load from Armory (Name: Maanish, Server: Saurfang-US) OR Load XML file (attached)
 
Error Message:
[Arg_IndexOutOfRangeException]
Arguments: 
Debugging resource strings are unavailable. Often the key and arguments provide sufficient information to diagnose the problem. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=106663&Version=4.0.50401.0&File=mscorlib.dll&Key=Arg_IndexOutOfRangeException

Comments.Message: Attached is a screenshot of the error message.
Cheers bud, didn't have time to do a search and compare similar issues, figured it was better to at least make a decent report instead of ignoring it altogether.

I know it can take a whole long time to copy/paste 'Arg_IndexOutOfRangeException' into the search box and hit enter and see the page of duplicates that are closed, and have titles like '[Rawr3.Warlock] Index out of Range Exception [Fixed by r50050!][Stop Making Duplicates!]', and click on that, and see that it's fixed, and that we're yelling at people to quit making duplicates of it... But please take the time to do so.
